name: [color=#530FAD]LOVR-11[/color]
text: Welcome [color=#87EA00]biological being[/color], I’m a [color=#530FAD]LOVR-11[/color] unit. My operative system is designed to [color=#FFAA00]store information and stories[/color], I can exchange them for new ones.

name: [color=#1240AB]Argos[/color]
text: I wanted to [color=#530FAD]find something just like you[/color]. I need to know where [color=#FFDF00]all this started[/color].

name: [color=#530FAD]LOVR-11[/color]
text: I think I have that [color=#FFAA00]information[/color], let me check my files…. [color=#FFAA00]*Zrrrrrrrrrrrr*[/color]

name: [color=#530FAD]LOVR-11[/color]
text: Registry found, please [color=#530FAD]let me hear[/color] a story [color=#1240AB]from you[/color].

name: [color=#1240AB]Argos[/color]
text: I didn't think I'd be [color=#1240AB]telling this story[/color] in the [color=#FFDF00]middle of nowhere[/color]. But I haven't [color=#1240AB]talked to anyone[/color] in a week, it might do me good to just talk a bit.

name: [color=#1240AB]Argos[/color]
text: I was [color=#87EA00]born on this planet[/color], during the event I was [color=#1240AB]far away[/color] on a mission.

name: [color=#1240AB]Argos[/color]
text: I was [color=#1240AB]forbidden to return[/color] to my home, and since then I can’t help feeling sorry for not being able to notify my [color=#CD0074]mother[/color], she [color=#C60000]couldn’t get out[/color].

name: [color=#530FAD]LOVR-11[/color]
text: [color=#FFAA00]Information stored[/color], you must go to [color=#C60000]District 39[/color]. There you’ll find what you’re [color=#CD0074]looking for[/color].

name: [color=#1240AB]Argos[/color]
text: It looks like I’m [color=#1240AB]coming back[/color]. Thanks for listening to me, [color=#530FAD]buddy[/color].

name: [color=#530FAD]LOVR-11[/color]
text: It [color=#530FAD]was a pleasure[/color] to meet you, [color=#1240AB]Argos[/color].

[color=#1240AB]Argos[/color] walked away from [color=#530FAD]the robot[/color] while thinking about how that machine knew [color=#1240AB]his name[/color]. Unfortunately, these robots only agree to [color=#FFAA00]exchange information once[/color].
